snippet: Laos inaugurated the construction of a controversial dam on the Mekong River, despite comments from the country’s prime minister that the project was on hold.
lead_paragraph: Laos inaugurated the construction of a controversial dam on the Mekong River, despite comments from the country’s prime minister that the project was on hold.

headline.seo: Laos Breaks Ground for Controversial Mekong Dam
headline.main: Laos Breaks Ground for Controversial Mekong Dam
headline.print_headline: Laos Breaks Ground for Controversial Mekong Dam
